name: Jitter's Frenzy
description:
"Jitters Frenzy" is a heart-pumping horror game that immerses players in an abandoned house filled with malfunctioning animatronics. Players take on the role of a curious visitor who decides to explore the house, only to discover that they are not alone. The house is filled with animatronic prototypes created by a family of inventors and engineers who mysteriously disappeared years ago, leaving their creations to run amok.

The game will be a sit and survive mixed with free-roam.

The player must navigate through the different rooms and levels of the house, piecing together clues and information about the family and their animatronics. However, they must also avoid detection by Jitters, the wolf-like animatronic who has become frenzied and unpredictable. As the night wears on, Jitters becomes more aggressive, making it even more challenging for players to avoid detection and escape the house alive.

The house is filled with hidden passages, secret rooms, and puzzles to solve, creating a challenging and engaging experience for players. The atmosphere is creepy and unsettling, with eerie sounds and jump scares that keep players on the edge of their seats. With its immersive environment and pulse-pounding gameplay, "Jitters Frenzy" is sure to provide an unforgettable horror experience.

Surely a revolutionary game I swear.
